sub_title: Freelance Principal/Senior Data Consultant/Developer/Engineer/Lead - Available for assigments
summary:
I have a broad range of IT and business knowledge and I am very passionate about business intelligence and anything related to data . I am very dedicated to (and succesfull in) truly helping companies move forward and add business value.

I have fully developed and maintained several innovative and valuable systems. Such as the MRF, a custom BI solution that enables a large oil and gas company to achieve major IT costs savings. Moreover, I also developed the BIM and BEM which are BI maturity based solutions that enable new streams of revenue for several IT service companies.

Furthermore, I developed a key management system for educational institutes and more. In addition, I have set up and maintained IT architectures/infrastructures/ITIL frameworks in several companies. Additionally, I have mapped, designed and improved processes for many years and can use any process modeling method needed such as: UML, BPMN, data/work flows, simulations, role based diagrams and Petrinet. 

Therefore, I have extensive knowledge in aspects related to business and IT, including: project/stakeholder/requirement/expectation management, agile scrum, coaching, data/database management, data enhancement/enrichment, meta-data management, data marts/warehouses, data mining, analytics, ETL, BI, reporting, visualizations, programming, design, business modeling, testing and more.

I strongly believe I can overcome any IT and business related challenge and solve them in the most efficient and effective way given the situation. Due to my diverse background, I can see and implement unique opportunities.

Also, I am creative and  a quick learner that takes great pride in delivering high quality results and I often go the extra miles. I am continuously learning and trying to improve whenever possible.

Seeking a high performer who delivers high quality and exceeds expectations? Feel free to contact me.

projects.description: This project is focused on improving data quality regarding operational data. Initially focused on creating insight in technical data aspects regarding data quality(completeness, correctness, format etc.). After this, data quality was measured on business logic through analytic/data science and other methods. A solution will be created that directly gives insight in the data quality throughout the entire organization.

projects.title: WS - Workflow management Scan
projects.description: For this project we developed a methodology/framework to measure if it is worthwhile to invest in the optimization of a process or multiple processes. This methodology/framework is translated in a full-fledged application. The key aspects regarding optimization are measured based on the user input. From this, the application and framework logic determines how effective optimization would be for a process or set of processes, This allows companies to not only priorities optimization of processes correctly but also prevents them from wasting resources on optimizations with minimal benefits or even negative effects.

projects.title: Data Migration
projects.description:
A large telecommunication company was in the process of converting their current ETL methods to new methods based on Informatica Powercenter. 

However, the knowledge about how the current ETL methods and application coding worked was lost. Therefore, I reverse engineered and translated the ETL applications and methods used into business logic. 

Based on this business logic we were able to convert the current ETL processes into the new Informatica Powercenter processes

projects.title: BEM – Business Intelligence Expansion Model
projects.description: The BEM model combines dimensions that play a role in the extent of BI. By linking questions to this model the BEMMT – Business Intelligence Expansion Model Measure Tool is created. When BI-users in a company use BEMMT it is possible to map the extent of BI within companies.

projects.title: TUF - The Usability Framework
projects.description:
The Usability Framework is a methodology that explains the use or non-use of applications, which is vital information for many companies in order to keep up and stay ahead of the competition.

Based on TUF  I build “The Usability Survey(TUS)”. Which can be used to test any applications to find out which factors are relevant in explaining their use or non-use.

contributors.headline: Freelance Principal/Senior Data Consultant/Developer/Engineer/Lead - Available for assigments

projects.title: BIM - BI Improvement Model
projects.description:
Many companies do not use there IT facilities optimal. This is not different in the area of business intelligence. At the time of this project there is no system or methodology available to help companies discover in detail where qualitative improvements are possible regarding their BI facilities. Therefore, the BIM methodology was created which allows companies to map, measure and discover in detail where qualitative improvements can be made to their BI facilities. Thus, allowing them to improve their BI maturity regarding BI qualitative aspects. This model is translated to full-fledged application allowing customers of CGI to map there qualitative BI maturity.

The BIM was successfully tested at several clients such as TNT. The BIM model has been successfully in cooperated into CGI their BI framework as a service.
